name: ZombieOut
description:
The zombie apocalypse has begun, and you have no place to go. Your car has no fuel, the street lights are out, and all the people you knew turned into zombies. In order to survive, you must defend your own house. The zombies will never stop until you're dead. So gather your guns, and defend your territory!

How to play     • Controls

        -> WASD - Move
        -> Enter - Shoot / Buy ammo
        -> 1, 2, 3 - Switch between guns
        -> P - Pause
        -> O - Next round
        -> C - View Controls

    • Ammo cost

        -> Pistol - $20, 75 ammo
        -> Rifle - $60, 35 ammo
        -> Shotgun - $90, 35 ammo (7 shots)

Follow the developer:

    Twitter
    Youtube

(PS: This is my first game, made with Python using Pygame.)
